node.html: This is a SR management system where admin can see the product description, Graphical zone of products, amount of max or min sales of specific area, can handle their own employee.
It is an Android-based app named word dictionary. Here, the android version is based on Lollipop (API: 22), but any version of Android users can use this application.

frontmatter.title: Pneumonia Detection (Binary Classification) from X-ray Images

node.html: It is a binary classification based application of chest disease (Pneumonia & No findings) using chest x-ray images on python with Keras and TensorFlow
It is a PHP based web development project for the hotel management system. With this website, anyone can book a hotel, choose the room of their choice and get several more hotel-based facilities.
It is a Library management system based on the database My-SQL. It also includes Relational Model, SQL query, ER-Diagram, Project Report, and its corresponding ppt file.
It is a Bank Management project based on Java. It is possible to make various types of banking transactions through this system.
